snippet: The Pew Research Center assessment found a level of support in stories about same-sex marriage that went far beyond the level recorded in public opinion surveys.
abstract: Media Decoder blog; Pew Research Center finds that news organizations are far more likely to present supportive view of same-sex marriage than antagonistic view; study assessed representative samples of mainstream coverage for two months in 2013, finding that many stories contained either balanced mix of views or no views at all.
lead_paragraph: The Pew Research Center assessment found a level of support in stories about same-sex marriage that went far beyond the level recorded in public opinion surveys.
